page.title: 15BIOGRAPHY; PAUL SHANE
page.content: The most{famous person}living in {Thrybergh}is the{television star}of {Hi-de-Hi, Paul Shane.}Before his television success Paul had made a name for himself as a{comedian}in the {local clubs.}He told us he was born in {Thrybergh}and lived there until he was five. Then he moved to{Dalton.}There he had lived nearly all his life until he met his wife,{Dorothy.}When he married he had wanted a house in the country but his wife had wanted to stay near{Thrybergh,}so they picked a house near a school. Later on as Paul's family grew, this house became too small and so they moved to their present home, a new house opposite Thrybergh Comprehensive School. It was here that his daughters were educated.
